sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USERID, PASS, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TEL, ADDRESS) VALUES(#userid#, #pass#, #name#, #gender#, #birth#, #tel#, #address#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID=#userid#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #userid# AND PASS = #pass#
SELECT ROWNUM, USERID, PASS, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TEL, ADDRESS FROM MEMBER
SELECT USERID, PASS, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TEL, ADDRESS FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #name#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASS = #pass#, NAME = #name#, GENDER = #gender#, BIRTH = #birth#, TEL = #tel#, ADDRESS = #address# WHERE USERID = #userid#
